text:
@RepAdamSchiff What have YOU done??
Other than distract our “leaders” in Congress, by doing an IMPEACHMENT FARCE,
So NONE bothered to show up to the #coronavirus Hearings in January! #Trump was already ON IT!!
You blew it Loser! No more farce hearings for you! #Trump2020
